citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at
3:35pm-3:55pm on 09-DEC-19.
At the facility entrance gate: honked, called out loudly and left message on phone number provided. Animal
caretaker arrived at 3:55 pm indicated that they were not available and he did not know when they would be back as
they had left that morning.

narrative:
